item.title: HobbyProgramming
item.dc:creator: sherinnovation
item.description: LED MatrixLED MatrixWired AnimationControlling a computer animation using two strands of wire connected to the parallel port of the computer.Flash Login UIThe program demonstrates interaction of flash and .NET modules using a simple login example.Parallel Port I/OThis program demnstrated the use of parallel port of a computer to control external[...]
item.content:encoded:
LED Matrix
LED Matrix
Wired Animation
Controlling a computer animation using two strands of wire connected to the parallel port of the computer.
Flash Login UI
The program demonstrates interaction of flash and .NET modules using a simple login example.
Parallel Port I/O
This program demnstrated the use of parallel port of a computer to control external devices.
Web Scraping Way2SMS
An online SMS sending website, named way2sms, being programmatically used to flood SMS to another phone.
Hands on Arduino
This is the first project I did when I bought the Arduino. A series of LEDs being controlled using the embedded controller.
8085 Simulator
An 8085 simulator. Shortage of enough hardware kits at my college lab was compelling for me developing this tool.
Keylogger
A bad guy's tool to fetch data from other's computer. This one records and sends data to a preset email address.
E-mail Tracking
A trustable personal tracking system that can monitor and alert the status of emails that have been sent to a recipient.
Flash - DotNet Interaction
A program that demonstrates the interaction of a module developed in flash with a module developed in .NET.
Gravity Animation
Had a lot of fun when I animated my desktop. Shows a situation when the desktop SPACE immediately gets some GRAVITY.
USB Guard
This tool helps fighting virus attacks from USB based devices. I developed this at the time when I couldn't afford an antivirus.

item.title: HobbyPencilArt
item.dc:creator: sherinnovation
item.description: Sree Narayana GuruNarayana Guru was a Hindu saint, sadhu and social reformer of India. He was born into an Ezhava family, in an era when people from that community and other communities that were regarded as Avarna, faced much social injustice in the caste-ridden Kerala society.My "Better Half" !My "Better[...]
item.content:encoded:
Sree Narayana Guru
Narayana Guru was a Hindu saint, sadhu and social reformer of India. He was born into an Ezhava family, in an era when people from that community and other communities that were regarded as Avarna, faced much social injustice in the caste-ridden Kerala society.
My "Better Half" !
My "Better Half" !
Lord Krishna
Krishna is the eighth incarnation of the god Vishnu in Hinduism. The name Krishna appears as the 57th and 550th name of Lord Vishnu in Vishnu Sahasranama of the Mahabharata
Goddess Juno
Juno is an ancient Roman goddess, the protector and special counselor of the state. She is a daughter of Saturn and sister (but also the wife) of the chief god Jupiter and the mother of Mars and Vulcan.
Lord Ganesha
Ganesha also spelled Ganesa, also known as Ganapati and Vinayaka is a widely worshipped deity in the Hindu pantheon. His image is found throughout India and Nepal. Hindu sects worship him regardless of affiliations.
Family Forever
COVID separated us to a level where I got stuck abroad unable to travel. The worst part is that I have never seen my own kids since they were born. It has been around 9 months now, and I thought I should touch them in colors at least. 
Night
Night

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: sherinnovation
item.description: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!
